channel.title: How Do i Make rune c'bows work
channel.description: Everyime i try it come out as a non existing even when i add it and i want it to shoot lke karils and the dragon and enchated and other bolts work with it Mind helping

item.title: How Do i Make rune c'bows work
item.dc:creator: @sp3c sp3c
item.description:
@sp3c wrote:

This should work, but I didnt test it.

Find this code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734) // karils x bow { return 2075; }

And under it add:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ID OF RUNE CROSSBOW) // rune crossbow { return 427; }

Replace ID OF RUNE CROSSBOW with the id of the rune crossbow. If you have any errors just post.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do i Make rune c'bows work
